1-02.name: Abandoned Shoppe
1-02.description: You step into the abandoned shop, there are several cracks in the floor the shelves are ransacked.  Several broken jars that once contained  potions now lie on the floor.  Other than that the shop seems empty.

1-01.name: Encampment
1-01.description: You step into the camp area, the fire is still burning.  Sir Jacob is standing next to the abandoned shop.  The chaos star surrounded by  pillars seems to be burning as if lit on fire.
